data.message: man im frustrated cuz everyone claiming their shits the latest claiming they illuminati but cant even help out a fellow satanist? well no wonder im pissed some fuck head tryed to shoot me i dodged all the bullets like neo so of course they missed and i got all these agents in the matrix saying shit that makes no sense playing shit that makes no sense so of course im tense must i speak the illest paragraph the illest sentence? that the mic explodes cuz it kept on getting barraged with lyricism so unrelentless? i am the evolution of slim shady style dont think so? watch me kill you with a sick smile cuz you said no hes not and stated it with denial fuck with the empire and ill raise your noose higher
